thread.title: Listeria outbreak frightens Tiger Brands' investors

title: Listeria outbreak frightens Tiger Brands' investors
text:
Listeria outbreak frightens Tiger Brands'investors 6:00pm GMT - 01:28 
Shares in South Africa's biggest consumer foods producer Tiger Brands and RCL Foods fell on Monday after the government linked a deadly listeria outbreak to cold meat products known as ''polony'' made by Tiger unit Enterprise Food. Laura Frykberg reports.
